title: What kind of weather do you like and dislike? Why?

korean: 나는 선선한 가을 날씨를 제일 좋아해.
너무 덥지도 춥지도 않아서 활동하기 딱 좋거든.
하늘도 맑고 공기도 상쾌해서 기분이 좋아져.
봄 날씨도 좋긴 한데, 미세먼지 때문에 좀 그래.
맑은 날엔 괜찮은데, 뿌연 날엔 밖에 나가기 싫어져.
너무 덥고 습해서 조금만 걸어도 땀이 나.
에어컨 없으면 잠도 제대로 못 자.
여름엔 밖에 나가는 것도 싫고 집에만 있고 싶어.
겨울도 추운 건 괜찮은데, 너무 춥고 바람 부는 날은 힘들어.
전체적으로 적당히 따뜻하거나 선선한 날씨가 제일 좋아.
english: I like cool fall weather the best.
It's not too hot or cold, so it's, you know, just right for activities.
The sky is clear and the air is refreshing, so I feel good.
It's perfect weather for walking or outdoor activities.
Spring weather is good too, but, like, it's a bit annoying because of fine dust.
On clear days it's okay, but on hazy days, I don't want to go outside.
On the other hand, I really hate summer weather.
It's so hot and humid that even if I walk a little, I sweat.
Without air conditioning, I can't even sleep properly.
In summer, I don't want to go outside and just want to stay home.
Winter is okay if it's cold, but days that are too cold and windy are tough.
Overall, I like weather that's moderately warm or cool the best.
